snippet: The Knicks have won the Atlantic Division title and have built a worthy case as title contenders. But they have failed to accomplish one thing this season: Beat the Chicago Bulls.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column notes New York Knicks will have final chance to defeat Chicago Bulls in upcoming game, feat that has eluded them this season despite their late-season surge.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks have won the Atlantic Division title and have built a worthy case as title contenders. But they have failed to accomplish one thing this season: Beat the Chicago Bulls.

headline.seo: So Far This Season, the Bulls Have the Knicks’ Number
headline.main: Nemesis for Knicks, Bulls Loom as Streak Busters
headline.print_headline: Nemesis for Knicks, Bulls Loom as Streak Busters
